feed.title: Bechno Kid's Hideout - Web Feed
feed.subtitle: The latest (and greatest?) from a beet disguised as a software engineer.

entry.title: May 16, 2025
entry.content:
Lots of new updates this time around!

Major updates:

  • Added a brand new shrine dedicated to one of my favorite Final Fantasy characters!
  • New button! There are also buttons available in 32x32 and 200x40.
  • My RSS feed now looks super fancy, making it easier to read without a feed reader. It looks a little weird in Firefox, but that's a problem for another day lol
  • Microblog and "Latest Status" widget have now been placed by StatusCafe to allow myself to make quick status updates without misleading others into thinking I made a huge update on the site. XD;;
  • Added a button that allows users to scroll to the top of the page. Yes, it is pure CSS. :3
  • Added a pixel club and some links!

Minor updates:

  • Changed the RSS feed icon to its original orange
  • Updated the example code in Status Cafe feed reader tutorial to be a bit more robust
  • Moved fanlistings and webrings into one page called "Joined"

entry.title: Apr 30, 2025
entry.content:
Hi there! I decided to bring back the /now page.

There is also an accessibility statement! I really want to make it clear that I'm trying to make my website as accessible as possible! It won't be perfect, but at least my site works on mobile!

entry.title: Apr 20, 2025
entry.content: Tons of new stuff and fixes this time around! There were also several big mistakes in the example code in the StatusFeed reader tutorial but are now fixed thanks to an email I got :)

entry.title: Apr 12, 2025
entry.content:
Bechno Kid's Hideout has finally joined the dark side and implemented a toggle for dark mode! It's unfortunately not available if Javascript is disabled...

Perhaps one day, I'll figure out a CSS-only light/dark toggle!
